dialogue.string: 1�PRODUCERS ONLY!!! OPENING EVENTSMISSION-RELATED.WARP.SAW OPENING EVENT.CHEAT ON FAME.RESET ALL??INITIAL SETTINGS.EX MISSIONS
1�You've got it all wrong again, Apururu. This poor adventurer was lost, so I kindly offered to help. Isn't that rightaru?
1�This is the north gatehouse of Windurst. If you're in need of a map of Windurst, head south to the Port District.
1�I heard a Mithra lady-wady was selling magic maps near the shops along the wharves there.
1�You cannot accept more than one mission at a timey-wimey. Please complete your current mission before applying for the next.
1�I shall now read out the missions you are able to receive...

1�Which mission will you accept?The Horutoto Ruins Experiment.The Heart of the Matter.The Price of Peace.Lost for Words.A Testing Time.The Three Kingdoms.Mission 2-3-1A.Mission 2-3-1B.Mission 2-3-2A.Mission 2-3-2B.To Each His Own Right.Written in the Stars.A New Journey.Magicite.The Final Seal.The Shadow Awaits.Full Moon Fountain.Saintly Invitation.The Sixth Ministry.Awakening of the Gods.Vain.The Jester Who'd Be King.Doll of the Dead.Moon Reading.Dummy11.Dummy12.Dummy13.Dummy14.Dummy15.Dummy16.Dummy17.Decline mission.
1�Accept this mission?Yes.No.
1�Hear the explanation?Yes, pleasey-weasey.No, thanky-hanky.
1�Hear the explanation?Yes, pleasey-weasey.No, thanky-hanky.
1�Receive a mission?Accept.Decline.
1�The Minister of the Orastery will tell you what the mission entails.
1�Now that you mention it, there's been an awful lot of these experiments going on lately. What is the Orastery up to this time?
1�We look forward to you assisting us with our next task.
1�Accept this mission?Accept.Decline.
1�The Manustery's Cardian workshop is southeast of here, in Windurst Woods.
1�To get to Windurst Woods, you have to pass through either Windurst Walls to the east, or Port Windurst to the south.
1�It's a long way to walk, but it's a good chance to get to know our country. Check your map to find the way, then consider it a leisurely strolly-wolly.
1�First, head to the Rhinostery's biological laboratory here in the south of Windurst Waters.
1�Once you have received the food offerings from the researchers there, go straight to the food offering altars in Giddeus. Exercise the utmost caution-waution!
1�Now that you made rank two, you can participate in conquests. To find out more about conquests, ask one of the conquest guards.
1�Accept Mission?Accept.Decline.
1�If you head straight back up the road there, you'll pass through the archway of a two-story building that opens out into the Huntsman's Court.
1�That's the Optistery. The Library of Magic is housed there. The Optistery stores a vast collection of books and scrolls that it lends out to the general public.
1�Accept Mission?Accept.Decline.
1�This is the first time you've accepted a mission for the Aurastery, right? The School of Magic run by the Aurastery is here in the eastern side of Windurst Waters.
1�You've been to the Aurastery before, right? The School of Magic run by the Aurastery is here on the east side of Windurst Waters.
1�The principal of the school is away as usual, so ask the teachers as to what your task is.
1�The School of Magic run by the Aurastery is here on the east side of Windurst Waters.
1�To find out what the mission is about, ask the teachers in the staff room there.
1�It gives food for thought...You too have finally become an able enough adventurer to be hailed by Heavens Tower.
1�Huh? But the one who summoned you was Heavens Tower's guardian of law and justice, Semih Lafihna!?
1�Uh-oh? What trouble did you get into? Don't tell me you're being sent to that scary-wary prison!
1�Once that Sibyl Guard fixes her eyes on you, trying to deceive her is a waste of timey-wimey.
1�Semih Lafihna is an especially close friend of the Star Sibyl. You better get a move on to Heavens Tower, or you'll be thrown in the Horutoto Ruins' jaily-waily!
1�Last time, Semih Lafihna called you to Heavens Tower. This time, it is the head lady-in-waiting, Zubaba, who has issued us with a writ of summons to give to you.
1�I can't even imagine what kind of mission-wission awaits you.
1�I just pray that they don't push some kind of completely unreasonable demand onto you. Anyway, you'd better hurry-wurry over to Heavens Tower again.
1�Zubaba, the Star Sibyl's head lady-in-waiting, has issued another writ of summons for us to pass on to you.
1�Sounds like she means business-wusiness. You'd better get a move on to Heavens Tower-wower!
1�If I had to pick one word to describe Zubaba, head lady-in-waiting, it would be...
1�...naggy-waggy-craggy-daggy-shaggy-scraggy-baggy-haggy!!!
1�...So, ahem, I strongly suggest you rush to Heavens Tower.
1�Attention!!!
1�We have a formal writ of summons from Heavens Tower for you. It is officially and formally a mission of the utmost importance.
1�A high and noble person awaits you there. Drop everything and hurry on over to Heavens Tower.

1�Of all the official documents issued by Heavens Tower, the ones with a special star emblem on them are top-class super-important papers! And this one is in the handwriting of the Star Sibyl herself!
1�Gee... I wish I could get invitations to Heavens Tower from the Star Sibyl like this one.
1�Keep your composure now,  . An emergency order has been issued to the guards and a select few adventurers loyal to Windurst.
1�The issuance of missions has been stopped pending-wending instructions from Heavens Tower. Please stand by till then.
1�This is an urgent-wurgent mission from Heavens Tower!
1�According to the mission instructions, you are to head to the cursed Northlands...or, more precisely, to the ruins of Fei'Yin, northeast of the Beaucedine Glacier.
1�You are to receive further details and a seal at Heavens Tower, so please head there right away.
1�According to the mission instructions, you are to head to the cursed Northlands...or, more precisely, to the ruins of Fei'Yin, northeast of the Beaucedine Glacier.
1�You are to receive further details and a seal at Heavens Tower. If you don't have the seal yet, you should go get it from the Great Star Tree before you proceed.
1� , we've received another star emblem letter addressed to you from Heavens Tower. You know the drill, right? Head back to Heavens Tower immediately.
1�Huh? You have some kind of business with us, the North Winds? Mokyokyo is our leader-weader, so speak to her first.
1�Oh, a foreigner, huh?If you're looking for the  [San d'Orian/Bastokan] Consulate, then head  [yonder southeast/south]... It's in  [Windurst Woods/Port Windurst]. Ta-taru.
1�If there's something you don't understand, just ask Jack of Hearts for a hand. You can find him in the plaza in fronty-wonty of the Optistery.
1�And even then, if you still don't understand something, pluck up the courage and ask your fellow adventurers for advice.
1�The four gatehouses are competing over who can get the most new recruits. I wonder how it's going.
1�I bet we North Winds are winning!??
1�Hurry on over to the Orastery. It's the big building in Port Windurst, far to the south of here.
1�Lucky you. Sounds like an exciting mission with that magic experiment going on. But, oh, I forgot! The Minister of the Orastery is THAT guy...
1�It might not feel like you're achieving much at firsty-wirsty, but your efforts are contributing to the peace of Windurst.
1�I'm sure my telling you that suddenly enthused you, didn't it?
1�Cardians are our automaton guards. They were originally created twenty years ago by Zonpa-Zippa, the Minister of the Manustery.

1�It's hard enough to collect the materials to make them, but it takes even more effort to train them. Occasionally a few go bonkers-wonkers and run away...or that's what the guys from the Manustery say.
1�I know we shouldn't ask this, but... Why do we have to provide the Yagudo with all this stuff anyway?
1�The beastman hordes were utterly defeated by our allied forces in the war twenty years ago, weren't they? So what's the dealy-wealy?
1�Whoa! You're alive?Are you sure you're not a ghosty-whosty?
1�Giddeus really was a scary-wary place, right?Anyway, I'm glad you made it back safely.
1�I don't read at all, so I have no interest in the library.
1�Reading books just isn't in vogue these days. It has to have the impact and excitement of a wandering minstrel's song or a street performance to grab the attention of people today.

1�That School of Magic is full of cheeky little genius brats. They are constantly poking their noses into adult business, so it should be interesting to see what kind of adults they become themselves.
1�You got it!I abhor children. I don't even want to believe I was once one myself.
1�I heard about the mission.It sure sounds serious.
1�A?`h! Boy, am I gladdy-waddy I'm just a simple guard. I'm not cut out for such responsible missions.
1�The Sibyl Guards who attend on the Star Sibyl are all Mithra.
1�But they are different from the other Mithra you see around town. They have made a heartfelt pledge of allegiance.
1�The Star Sibyl's vestal ladies-in-waiting are the admiration and dream of every Tarutaru girl.
1�Ahhh...I wish I was born a girl so I could serve at the side of the great Sibyl. Not that serving by the side of Mokyokyo is bad or anything...
1�Wow! A writ of summons with a star emblem on it! You are incredible! Incredibly incredible!
1�I knew there was something different about my friend,  . I bet you have a lucky star shining down on you. You should treasure it greatly!
1�What in Windurst is going on?For Heavens Tower to stop us from issuing missions...? Almost looks like we're about to go to war, or something!
1�Ah!? No, we couldn't possibly be...!Windurst is in a peace accord, right?
1�I heard from Mokyokyo that the talisman that sealed the Shadow Lord has been stolen!

1�The talisman itself was supposed to be sealed away in the central tower of the Horutoto Ruins with a magical barrier protecting it, right!? The one who stole it must be an extremely powerful magician!
1�Seems as though the conference of ministers has ended. I wonder what was on the agenda-wenda of that meeting?
1�Hey, now your position is high enough to come and go from Heavens Tower as you please, right? I promise not to tell anyone, so please let me know what's going on!
1�I don't know what happened, but the people from Heavens Tower look a lot brighter than before.
1�Hey, you're high enough in position to freely come and go from Heavens Tower, right? I promise I won't tell anyone, so please let me know what's going on!
1�How goes the adventuring life?Your new mission is from the Orastery, rightaru?
1�Minister Ajido-Marujido is the most super spell-slinger in Windurst. Or maybe that would be Doctor Shantotto?
1�I wonder who would win in a duel of dweomers? It would be a close match, don't you think?
1�The mages of the Orastery must all be in a flurry-scurry. The imprisonment of a minister is unprecedented.
1�What can be done to soothe the fury-wury of the Star Sibyl?No matter how much I ponder-wonder, I justaru can't think of anything!
1�Did you think things would get easier as your rank got higher?
1�Heh-heh-heh, you've got it all topsy-turvy. There aren'taru too many high-ranked adventurers, so you get to do all the really difficultaru missions!
1�Minister Rukususu is so dreamy-weamy.If she stays Minister of the Rhinostery, the number of members will go through the roof.
1�Hm? How is she dreamy-weamy?How can you not know? It's that fragrance. I'm so head over heels, I can't think straight anymore.
1�Have you met Professor Koru-Moru?He's the very, um, unique professor in Windurst Walls.
1�He once retired as the principal of the School of Magic, but due to an incidentaru a couple of years ago, he was reinstated.
1�Minister Apururu hates it when people call her ??Miss Minster Apururu,?? so everybody leaves off the ??Miss??.
1�She's also the youngest of the five ministers, but probably works the hardest at managing her ministry.It's still in the red, though...
1�I wonder what is to become of Windurst? Is there anything that a simple-wimple guard like me can do...?
1�For now, I just practice my swordplay with Ten of Hearts every day. He doesn't get tired, so he makes a good training partner.
1�You probably don't know who Minister Ajido-Marujido and Miss Apururu's father is, do you?
1�Huh, your expression says otherwise. Has it become that well-known? I guess that was a silly-billy question to ask a well-connected adventurer like yourself.
1�Isn'taru it about time for the five ministries to have their meeting?
1�But with the way things have been lately-wately, I wouldn'taru be surprised if they skip-pipped it. Minister Ajido-Marujido hasn't even returned to the Orastery yet.
1�We have heard accounts of roguey-wogue Cardians crossing Sarutabaruta. Have you heard or seen anything?
1�If we don't get confirmation for these sightings, we can't make a report to Heavens Tower. For the momentaru, I have my subordinates looking into it...
1�I have a distantaru relative, an adventurer by trade, who said he had seen a Tarutaru being held captive by mandragora in a dungeon somewhere.
1�Could that be the missing Principal of the Aurastery, perhaps? If it is, maybe it would be bestaru just to leave things well alone.
1�You look new to these parts.I guess we should introduce ourselves to each other-wother. This is the north gatehouse, and we're the guards whose duty it is to protect Windurst.
1�If you're a citizen of Windurst, then pleasey-weasey sign up for your first mission here! We're having a bet with the other gatehouses over who can gainy-wainy the most new recruits.
1�Was Miss Apururu well?
1�If Miss Apururu is well, then I'm happy-wappy.
1�Can you stand on your own two feetsy-weetsy as an adventurer yet?
1�If so, then you should help out other new adventurers. Kindness is the most whooper-dooper magic that anyone can use.
1�Hmm... My first task was to clean up the garbage in Sarutabaruta. Thinking back now...boy, those days were peaceful!
1�Thank you for your continuing service.We hope you'll keep up the effort by helping us out with our next task.
1�I can't hide the fact that I'm a big fan of Apururu from the Manustery!
1�She's always so nice and kindy-windy, never failing to show her shining smiley-wiley, despite her tragic past.
1�Listen here! You better complete Apururu's mission as fasty-wasty and as perfectly-werfectly as possible. Don't you dare mess up! You got it?
1�Make no mistakey-wakeys!Although we're supposed to be on friendly terms with the Yagudo, Giddeus is still a dangerous dungeon.
1�Even if you explain that you're simply a messenger from Windurst, they'll say that they have to ??test?? you to determine the truth.Then they all start to attack you.
1�You were able to deliver the goods to Giddeus, huh?Congratulations! That means you're now rank two!
1�Make no mistakey-wakeys!Although we're supposed to be on friendly terms with the Yagudo, Giddeus is still a dangerous dungeon.
1�Even if you explain that you're simply a messenger from Windurst, they'll say that they have to ??test?? you to determine the truth.Then they all start to attack you.
1�It's very unusual for the Optistery to ask for assistance from the gatehouses.
1�For ordinary overdue library books, the Optistery just asks any passer-by to help them out. I wonder if something serious has happened!?
1�The School of Magic!?That place is a number-crunching hell! One step inside there and you're instantly differentiated and evaluated.
1�Shivers!That place is, like, 2.352 times scarier than Giddeus!
1�Heavens Tower is actually a giant star tree blessed with the protection of the skies and stars. It truly-wuly is the center of Windurst.
1�After the war, several Mithra cubs were sent to serve at Heavens Tower.
1�By rights they should have been mere ladies-in-waiting, but by the Star Sibyl's grace, they were allowed to serve as special protectors of Heavens Tower. That's how the Sibyl Guards were born.
1�According to the budding young ladies-in-waiting, the worst part about Heavens Tower is the mumbling-grumbling nagging of their head lady-in-waiting, Zubaba.
1�I wonder why the older you get, the louder you grow. I guess you can't chew on things as well as you used to, so you bite at people instead.
1�You shouldn't be dawdling here.Hurry on over-wover to Heavens Tower!
1�You're nowhere near high enough in position to keep the Star Sibyl waiting. Not in a million light-years...! You better head to Heavens Tower immediately!
1�Hmm... Heavens Tower is in turmoil over something big.
1�My little sister is a lady-in-waiting, so I want to ask her about a lot of this stuff. But that would just be putting her on the spot.
1�Our fellow guards are currently checking whether the talismans sealed away in the other countries are safe or not.
1�You have already received the order to head out for the ruins of Fei'Yin. Carry out your appointed task well, my friend! We're counting on you!
1�As soon as I heard the sudden convocation of the five ministries, I had a bad feeling about it.
1�After the last incident in the Horutoto Ruins, I knew there was something scary-wary going down.
1�A little while ago, a letter with a shooting star emblem on it was delivered to each of the ministers of the five ministries.
1�A shooting star emblem signifies ??as fast as possible,?? so I delivered them as quickly-wickly as I could.
1�There's a well-known story from the time when Minister Ajido-Marujido was in magic school.
1�The minister got stompily-womped in the monster-hunting exam on Buburimu Peninsula when he tried to beat the record held by Karaha-Baruha. He really-weally hates to lose.
1�The Star Sibyl awaits you at Heavens Tower. It appears to be a very gravy-wave matter.
1�If you're thinking of running off to another country, now's the time to do it. I should tell you, though, the guards will definitaruly come after you. I'm sorry you gotaru mixed up in all this.
1�Minister Tosuka-Porika of the Optistery was never very buddy-wuddy with Minister Ajido-Marujido.
1�So when the Minister of the Orastery was captured, Minister Tosuka-Porika was pleased as punchy-wunch. He's that sortaru of guy.
1�Most people think that the Rhinostery justaru researches plants, but actually, their research encompasses all living things.
1�Biology researchers wander all over Vana'diel.The mostaru capable adventurers of the Rhinostery always accompany these researchers on their treks into dangerous territory.
1�The principal of the School of Magic is a very pleasant, although eccentric, character.
1�When we were kids--just normal students at the school, the principal would come and join in our Tarutaru games.
1�I can't bear to see Miss Apururu's tears. I'll personally taru and feather anyone who messes with my Apururu!
1�I detestaru that Ajido-marujido.This is all his fault!
1�At times like these, you've gotta be cool, calm, and... Um...
1�We guards are Windurst's last line of defense. No mattaru what happens, I must keep Miss Apururu safe from harm.
1�Miss Apururu and her brother are in such a pickle-wickle... If their father, Zonpa-Zippa, was still with us, he would have saved them from this sticky situation.
1�......Or maybe things justaru would've gotten worse. Zonpa-Zippa was never known for being a particularly helpful-welpful guy...
1�Even with Minister Ajido-Marujido's return to consciousness and the pardoning of his crimes, Miss Apururu still looks all pasty-wasty!
1�She mustaru be working too hard. The Cardians should be doing all the menial tasks of the Manustery!
1�You wanna know what kind of person Zonpa-Zippa was?
1�...Zonpa-Zippa was an extremely-wemely strict minister. He pushed our children to their limits with his unrelentaruing style of education.
1�He was particularly harsh with Ajido-Marujido.
1�Seeing the smiley-wiley faces of the children when I do my rounds of Windurst Waters justaru blows my tiredness away.
1�And to top it all off, even the Mithra we pass have begun greeting us in a friendly fashion. Isn't that greataru?

1�The basic rules of Brenner are as follows:
1�First, the participants divide into two teams. Each side's camp contains the same number of ??Flammen-Brenner.??
1�At the beginning of the match, half of each side's Flammen-Brenner will be ablaze with ??Flamme,?? or flame, while the other half will remain unlit.
1�Participants can seize a Flamme from the opposing side's Flammen-Brenner and carry it around the Isle.
1�The goal is to steal your opponent's Flamme and use them to light your side's Flammen-Brenner.
1�The side that succeeds in lighting all of its Flammen-Brenner will be declared the winner after a specified amount of time.
1�If neither side is victorious before the match ends, the outcome will be judged based on the score. The ??match score?? section of the rulebook contains more information on this subject.
1�Brenner is significantly divided into public and private matches. Official matches are held periodically according to level and feature general participation.
1�You cannot reserve the Isle when an official match is being held.
1�No items are necessary for participation, but a minor fee will be collected. You will be unable to participate if your level is too low.

1�The match outcome will be recorded unless the number of participants fails to exceed 
� members, or if there are fewer than 
 members in a match where the two sides' numbers differ. In such cases, the game will be considered a training match and will not be recorded.
1�Private matches require a reservation, and participation may be limited. The Master of Ceremonies (MC) can freely adjust the rules and control match proceedings.
1�??LS Liga?? is a form of private match. You can learn more about LS Liga by speaking to a Marshal.
1�A Flammen-Brenner is a device that contains a Flamme (flame). The Flammen-Brenner is covered by a grate that will open after taking a set amount of damage, exposing the Flamme.
1�The participants must utilize this chance to seize the Flamme before the grate recloses. Once the grate is closed, the Flammen-Brenner will begin recovering from the damage it has been dealt.
1�If you manage to open the opposing team's Flammen-Brenner and capture their Flamme, you should make haste to light one of the Flammen-Brenner on your side.
1�After a certain amount of time, the Flamme will burn out and the opposing team's Flammen-Brenner will be relit.
1�Also, please note that you cannot quicken your pace using any special abilities while you are in possession of a Flamme.
1�In the event that neither side fulfills the conditions for victory, the outcome of the match will be evaluated based on score.

1�Ten points are awarded to each side for every lit Flammen-Brenner, while one point is awarded whenever a Flamme is captured, used to light a Flammen-Brenner, or recaptured from an opponent. One point is also awarded for protecting the Flammen-Brenner for a certain period of time.
1�Like Ballista, quarry (/quarry) can be used while playing Brenner. Participants may use this ability to dig up Petras and temporary items.
1�However, unlike Ballista Petras, Brenner Petras have no effect on the match score. You can trade a Petra to a Pursuivant to recover your HP and MP at no expense to TP.
1�Sprint cannot be used while carrying a Petra. Also, please note that the scout ability cannot be used in Brenner.
1�Petras will be lost in the event of a KO, but can be carried over from one match to another.
1�The sprint (/sprint) ability can be used to increase the player's speed when not in possession of a Flamme or Petras.
1�In the event of a KO, you will be returned to your team's camp. However, recovery will take longer the more often you fall in battle.
1�In other words, you will receive a penalty if you fall immediately after recovering from KO. In addition, your TP will be reduced to zero and you will lose any Petras in your possession.

1�Greetings and well met. I am a Voidwatch scientist charged with researching the potential uses of atmacite.
1�I beg of you, friend. Lend us your stout sword arm in the fight to protect Vana'diel from the Voidwalker threat.
1�Those who possess 6???? may come to me to have their hard-won atmacite infused.Stratum abyssite also falls within my domain, so present to me any whose properties you wish to have analyzed.
1�Ah, I'm also authorized to teleport folk to operation sites. Quite versatile, aren't I?

1�Hmmm... I'm afraid the stone isn't exhibiting any signs of growth.

1�Atmacite is best described as the crystalline agglomeration of a creature's soul.Our scientists have succeeded in discovering a way to tap its power to serve the efforts of the Voidwatch.
1�By infusing one's body with atmacite, it is possible to obtain powers akin to those once possessed by the creature whence it came, rather like turning a beast's fangs upon its own kind.
1�At first glance, atmacite appears to be the perfect artificial enhancement. However, it does suffer from a single limitation: its power is unleashed only when engaged in a Voidwatch operation.
1�Research to identify the exact reason for this continues, but most scientists find the spectral alignment theory compelling.
1�That is, being formed of Voidwalker souls, atmacite will surge to life only when its bearer is existentially aligned to its dimension of origin.
1�From this it can be inferred that Voidwalkers are stripped of considerable strength when they cross over into Vana'diel.
1�But I suspect this is of little interest to a layman like you. Allow me to return to the subject at hand.
1�The infusion of atmacite requires cruor, a potent energy source that takes the form of shiny red granules.
1�Cruor is obtainable by various means, felling a Voidwalker being the most common of all.As you can never have too much cruor, I urge you to be diligent in its procurement.
1�We've recently perfected a method for improving atmacite potency. The process is called enrichment, and involves fusing cruor on to atmacite to amplify its power.

1�Atmacite can be enriched in stages up to a maximum of level 
�. The quantity of cruor required varies with the variety of atmacite as well as its current enrichment level.

1�Under normal conditions, atmacite enrichment is an intensive process that demands trained hands.For reasons yet to be determined, however, both infusion and enrichment can be safely performed by laymen, provided they're at a planar rift.
1�Keep this in mind should the need arise to reconfigure your atmacite with haste.

1�What will you do?Nothing for now.Ask a bunch of questions.Participate in Voidwatch Ops.Request debriefing.Request 3????.Check voidstone stock.Request reward issuance.

1�What will you ask about?Nothing.The Voidwalker threat.How I can do my part.The Voidwatch.Voidwatchers.Ascent items.Riftworn pyxides.?5????.Stratum abyssite.Planar rifts.Cruor.Abyssite.Voidstone consumption.
1�I am a Voidwatch officer dispatched here by the  �[Grand Duchy of Jeuno/Allied Forces of Altana].My duty is to recruit able-bodied soldiers to assist in repelling the Voidwalker threat.
1�While your enthusiasm is heartening, the Voidwatch requires men and women of tested steel.Come back again once you have proven your worth.
1�I beseech you, friend. Lend your aid to our cause, lest our fair Vana'diel be engulfed in fire and brimstone.
1�??Voidwalker?? is the name given to creatures that roam the realm between worlds.
1�Little is known about them at this time, except that they're driven by an insatiable lust for destruction.
1�While reports of Voidwalker encounters vary greatly in content, one thing is certain: the creatures are gaining in strength, a mounting threat that cannot be left unchecked.
1�In our effort to neutralize the Voidwalker menace, the Voidwatch is petitioning adventurers to lend their aid.
1�As the nature of Voidwalker battles renders full-scale military operations unfeasible, we have chosen to stake our success on the mobility and versatility of adventurers.
1�In our effort to neutralize the Voidwalker menace, the Voidwatch is petitioning soldiers of the Allied Forces to lend their aid.
1�To be sure, there're those who question the wisdom of thinning our ranks in the face of the Shadow Lord's armies. But I assure you, friend, the Voidwalker threat is no less real.
1�Our scouts regularly bring back intel on locations of suspected Voidwalker presence.
1�Armed with this information, we dispatch strike teams to preemptively neutralize the threat.
1�Ordinarily, Voidwalkers cannot be seen, let alone fought.Only by using the voidstone's power can we force them to feel the sting of our steel.
1�These magicked stones are distributed in regular shipments from our Jeuno-based research team.They're the bare minimum we need to have a fighting chance against the enemy.
1�Voidstones work by realigning your existential spectrum to match that of Voidwalkers, thus rendering the creatures visible to you.

1�The stones are highly prized, such is the difficulty of their creation. As such, supplies are limited to 
� stones per person at any given time.
1�That's provided we have any in stock at all. Much time is required in imbuing them with requisite powers.
1�The Voidwatch is an organization that exists for the sole purpose of protecting the world from extradimensional invaders we call ??Voidwalkers.??
1�Recognizing the graveness of this threat, the nations of the Middle Lands joined together in common cause and formed the Voidwatch.
1�Helming the organization is the Grand Duchy of Jeuno, with the remaining three nations contributing resources for its operation.
1�Possession of 6???? is a requirement for participating in Voidwatch Ops.
1�It can be earned only through loyal service to your nation, and thus serves as a testimonial for your prowess.
1�You would do well to obtain one if you haven't already done so.
1�Affiliation with the Allied Forces of Altana is a requirement for participating in Voidwatch Ops.
1�In other words, you must belong to the armed forces of one of the three nations.
1�The enlistment procedure varies depending on nation. Those wishing to obtain a recommendation letter should pay visit to one of the military encampments surrounding Jeuno.
1�When you battle a Voidwalker, you must do so as a ??Voidwatcher??--a defender of the dimension who has harnessed the powers of the voidstone and stratum abyssite.
1�Bereft of these two objects, Voidwalkers cannot be seen, let alone fought.
1�However, there are a few points all budding Voidwatchers should bear in mind.
1�Most crucial of all, the extradimensional nature of being a Voidwatcher renders you isolated and unable to receive help from the outside world.
1�Scientists attribute this to the dimensional misalignment that occurs. As people are ordinarily unable to see Voidwalkers, so too are they unable to see you.
1�But you needn't concern yourself with the hows and whys of such matters. It would behoove you far more to become familiar with the workings of the ??existential spectrum.??
1�You see, each dimension is composed of an existential spectrum to which all things within are aligned.In turn, the spectrum is formed of five lights: blue, red, yellow, green, and white.
1�The alignment of these lights between Voidwalker and Voidwatcher plays an important role in our efforts.
1�To elaborate, the act of rendering a Voidwalker visible is essentially an act of aligning ourselves to its existential spectrum.

1�Now, while Voidwatchers are able to, for all practical purposes, interact with these creatures, they in fact fall short of full alignment. Symptoms of this imperfect state can be observed in the limited quantity and quality of spoils normally yielded by Voidwalkers.
1�Compensating measures, however, have been developed to allow combatants to more closely attune themselves with their extradimensional foe.
1�One such method involves the use of alignment-enhancing artifacts known as ??ascent items,?? while another entails performing certain actions against the enemy.
1�Both methods aim to manipulate the alignment value of individual lights to various ends.
1�All five lights influence the contents of the treasure chest which appears at the successful end of battle.
1�Our researchers have succeeded in determining what manner of benefits are associated with each light.
1�For instance, improving blue spectral alignment is known to produce greater quantities of spoils.
1�In contrast, manipulating red spectral alignment reportedly enhances the quality of individual items--potions becoming hi-potions, and so forth.
1�Yellow and green, on the other hand, influence experience gain and cruor yield respectively.
1�If you wish to know more about the curious red substance we call cruor, you need but ask.
1�Lastly, we have white spectral alignment, which is unique even in this company.It has been determined to affect the appearance of transdimensional objects such as atmacite and periapt.
1�Research regarding these artifacts is still ongoing.
1�Lastly, be reassured that there're no known negative effects of manipulating spectral alignment. We unreservedly encourage all Voidwatch operatives to endeavor towards maximum alignment.
1�Ascent items are unique objects that can be used to manipulate the spectral alignment of corresponding lights in the existential spectrum.
1�?%???? and %???? are representative of such items.They're the pride and joy of our Jeuno-based research team, who'd have folk believe they're the greatest inventions since airships.
1�(Just between you and me, though, it is Far Eastern scientists that pioneered the technology they're based upon.)
1�They're not the only means by which we manipulate spectral alignment, mind you. Similar results can be achieved by performing specific actions against the enemy.
1�Truth be told, much is still shrouded in mystery. What actions will produce the desired effect is something you will have to discover for yourself through trial and error.
1�Defeating a Voidwalker will cause a mysterious pyxis to emerge at the selfsame planar rift whence the creature was felled.
1�Such riftworn pyxides exhibit a most peculiar characteristic: the content they bear reportedly changes depending on who glimpses within.

1�Our scientists conjecture that this is due to some trick of spectral alignment. As with numerous other mysteries surrounding Voidwalkers, however, I highly doubt they have even an inkling of understanding.But I digress...
1�Only one combatant need possess a voidstone for all party or alliance members to do battle with a Voidwalker. Of the other squad members only stratum abyssite is required.
1�As always seems to be the case, however, there is a catch.Pyxides have been observed to yield less spoils for combatants without a voidstone of their own.
1�It scarce needs be said, but it would be to your benefit to have both the aforementioned items readied before taking on a Voidwalker.

1�Lastly, a warning: pyxides will eventually vanish if left untouched overlong.Our scientists have put forth the theory of normalizing spatial dissonance, but you needn't concern yourself with their mumbo-jumbo.
1�Just see to it that your hard-earned spoils are claimed in good time, and things will be rosy for all involved.
1�The 3???? is a magicked object produced by the Voidwatch's Jeuno-based research wing.
1�Its innocuous appearance belies the immense power it holds...the power to render Voidwalkers visible to its bearer.
1�The stone achieves this feat by realigning our existential spectrum to that of the creature.
1�I shall explain the process in layman's terms for your benefit. No need to thank me--I merely perform my duty.
1�I want you to visualize two canvases, each the same distance from the other. Yes, as two separate objects are normally wont to be.
1�Imagine you and I standing on one of the canvases--what else does one do with a canvas but stand on it, yes?
1�Now, imagine Voidwalkers standing on the other canvas, doing whatever it is Voidwalkers do. Destroying things and behaving with utter impropriety, no doubt.

1�Being on two different canvases, it follows that we cannot touch the Voidwalkers, let alone see them.Actually, that doesn't explain why we can't see the Voidwalkers...unless it's a magical canvas they're on that makes all things upon it invisible! Yes, that'll serve!

1�And this brings us full circle back to the voidstone. I want you to think of it as a magical paintbrush that we use to...grapple ourselves over to the Voidwalkers' canvas. Thence the fighting begins.
1�I trust you now have a rudimentary understanding of the process. That's all you need, really.Leave the fractal geometry to the fractal geometrists, I always say.
1�As long as you remember the canvas and the paintbrush--that's the voidstone--you cannot go astray.Now, to apprise you of more practical matters...

1�The stones are highly prized, such is the difficulty of their creation. As such, supplies are limited to 
� stones per person at any given time.
1�That's provided we have any in stock at all. Much time is required in imbuing them with requisite powers.
1�Twenty hours (Earth time) is required to produce a stone and imbue it with the necessary magicks, although word is that this may be shortened as research progresses.
1�Mind you, this isn't the only variety of stone you'll be needing.There exists another: stratum abyssite.
1�Whereas the voidstone serves as a power source, acting as a compass for channeling that power is stratum abyssite.Only by using the two in conjunction can we achieve our objectives.
1�Are you familiar with voiddust?Put simply, it is a granular substance from which voidstones may be fabricated.
1�As I explained, significant time is required to produce a voidstone from scratch.Provide me with voiddust, however, and I can fashion a stone for you in short order.

1�The same comrades of ours who stock ascent items may also furnish you with voiddust.Why do they not fabricate the stones themselves, or deliver the dust directly to me?Shush! The Voidwatch works in mysterious ways, and it would behoove you to inquire no further.
1�At any rate, should you manage to obtain any voiddust in your travels, you need only return here and trade it to me.Simple enough, wouldn't you say?
1�Stratum abyssite is needed to do battle with a Voidwalker at one of the many planar rifts that have manifested across the land.
1�You can't simply use one wherever you like, mind you, for each stone is attuned only to rifts found in a certain region, or ??jurisdiction.??
1�Undertaking a Voidwatch operation in a specific jurisdiction requires that you obtain the corresponding stone from the presiding Voidwatch officer.
1�While these stones are capable of rendering Voidwalkers visible to their bearers, their powers can only be tapped when used in conjunction with 6????.
1�Furthermore, this particular variety of abyssite is known to absorb the energy released by felled Voidwalkers. Not any of the creatures, mind you, but only those drawn to planar rifts.

1�Absorbing this energy causes the abyssite to evolve, or more accurately, makes it attuned to other planar rifts.This, of course, translates to an expanded sphere of Voidwatch Ops in which the bearer may participate.
1�Based on the evolutionary state of your stratum abyssite, the Voidwatch will direct you to a suitable operation area.
1�If you wish to have your stone analyzed, simply present it to an atma refiner.
1�Planar rifts--weak points in the fabric of space--have manifested across the land.The Voidwalker hordes roam beyond, unchecked and ever seeking to enter and plunge Vana'diel into chaos.
1�By invoking the power of stratum abyssite, it is possible to battle the fell creatures as a ??Voidwatcher??--a defender of our dimension.
1�Those also possessed of a voidstone will find their Voidwatcher experience greatly enhanced.
1�Alone, however, stratum abyssite serves no purpose; only when used in conjunction with a voidstone can its powers be unleashed.
1�Hence, at least one member of your squad--be it party or alliance--must possess a voidstone in order to arrange a confrontation with a Voidwalker.
1�Keep this fact in mind at all times.
1�It is not known when the planar rifts first manifested. Some say they've always been there, while others claim recent events have triggered their appearance.
1�If only we could return to the past, perhaps we could shed some light upon this mystery...
1�Obtainable by defeating Voidwalkers, cruor is an energy source that takes the form of shiny red granules.
1�While appearing to be some manner of mineral, detailed analysis has revealed that cruor is in fact organic.
1�As far as our researchers can tell, however, it's inanimate like most well-behaved plants.There's no fear of cruor suddenly springing to life in your palms.
